name: Transeo AISBL, European Association for SME Transfer
goal: Transeo encourages and promotes the exchange of good practices between experts to stimulate the European SME transfer market. Transeo increases awareness of the business transfer issue at regional, national and European level and works on solutions and projects to improve business transfer at European scale.
euInitiatives:
Transfer of SMEs
COSME
ENTREPRENEURSHIP 2020 ACTION
